com.ashwin.fri.genetic

Class GeneticPopulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ashwin.fri.genetic.GeneticPopulation

  • public class GeneticPopulation
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeneticPopulation(GeneticDecoder decoder, java.util.Properties props)
      Creates a new GeneticPopulation with randomized chromosomes using the genetic algorithm parameters specified by the properties file.
      GeneticPopulation(GeneticDecoder decoder, java.util.Properties props, GeneticChromosome[] pop)
      Creates a new GeneticPopulation from an existing chromosome array.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GeneticPopulation evolve()
      This method evolves the population by one generation.
      double getAverageFitness()
      Returns the average fitness of the population.
      GeneticChromosome getBestChromosome()
      Returns the most fit chromosome in the population.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneticPopulation

        public GeneticPopulation(GeneticDecoder decoder,
                 java.util.Properties props)
        Creates a new GeneticPopulation with randomized chromosomes using the genetic algorithm parameters specified by the properties file.
        Parameters:
        decoder - genetic decoder implementation
        props - algorithm parameters

      • GeneticPopulation

        public GeneticPopulation(GeneticDecoder decoder,
                 java.util.Properties props,
                 GeneticChromosome[] pop)
        Creates a new GeneticPopulation from an existing chromosome array. This is used by the evolve method to generate new generations.
        Parameters:
        props - algorithm parameters
        decoder - genetic decoder implementation
        pop - population

    • Method Detail

      • evolve

        public GeneticPopulation evolve()
        This method evolves the population by one generation. It performs elitism, selection, mating, and mutation.
        Returns:
        evolved population

      • getAverageFitness

        public double getAverageFitness()
        Returns the average fitness of the population.

      • getBestChromosome

        public GeneticChromosome getBestChromosome()
        Returns the most fit chromosome in the population.
